content: The open game engine has a new beginner-friendly upgrade to its syntax. Here's what prisoner's dilemma looks like now: Screenshot-2021-04-15-at-17.52.34.png
There's still as much category theory as ever inside it, but we're pretty aggressively hiding it from users now
(And using a mountain of category theory to do prisoner's dilemma is still nuking a mosquito)
As long as the mosquito is dead, and not mutated into some kind of ubersquito that drives us to extinction. :smirk:

I got this phrase from https://mathoverflow.net/questions/42512/awfully-sophisticated-proof-for-simple-facts , I use it for when you use compositional methods to handle examples that are small enough to do by hand
It's a perfectly fine idiomatic phrase. I was just taking it to cartoonish extreme (and from there the uber/driving pun was irresistible).
